newsitem.title: USA: U.S. defense secretary to meet Chinese military chief.
newsitem.headline: U.S. defense secretary to meet Chinese military chief.

text.p: U.S. Defence Secretary William Cohen will meet Fu Quanyou, chief of the General Staff of China's People's Liberation Army, at the Pentagon on Friday, defence officials said on Thursday.
Fu is the guest of General John Shalikashvili, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, who will host a full honours arrival ceremony for his Chinese counterpart.

During his eight day U.S. visit, Fu is scheduled to meet senior U.S. military and civilian officials, the Pentagon said. It said he arrived in Washington on Thursday and will leave on Saturday with stops in San Francisco and at the U.S. Pacific Command, Camp Smith, Hawaii, before returning home.
